subject: Music
title: Trap Music Takes Over
description: A micro-lesson that makes Trap Music Takes Over usable.

hook.text: Trap music's booming 808s and hi-hat rolls became the dominant sound of the 2010s.

buildup.text: T.I., Gucci Mane, and Jeezy pioneered the sound in Atlanta's underground scene.

discovery.text: Trap production uses heavy bass, rapid hi-hats, and dark atmospheric synths.

twist.text: Trap crossed into pop, EDM, and even country â€” becoming the default sound of modern music.

climax.text: What started in Atlanta trap houses became the global template for popular music.

punchline.text: Atlanta didn't just make a genre. It made the sound of a decade.

quiz.question: What city is trap music most associated with?
